page.title: 16U.A.M. (Auchtermuchty)
page.content: {United Agricultural Merchants}supply fertilizers, feeding stuffs and agrichemicals for the farmers. They buy different crops from them.{U.A.M. {employs{20}people. They are busiest in{August}and{ {September}at harvest time.The quietest time is{June.}20,000 tonnes of grain can be stored in the mill.{U.A.M.}dry and clean all the rubbish out of the grain and then it is sent to a distillery and made into{whisky. { }Mr Maclennan's job is to buy and sell cereals.{U.A.M.}deals with bread milling wheat, biscuit making wheat, animal feeding wheat, malting barley, brewing barley, animal feeding barley, milling oats, clipping oats and animal feeding oats.{1,000 tonnes}are from our area.{U.A.M.}has 6 branches in{ {Scotland}with the Head Office in Auchtermuchty.
